body_html: Ah yes, that makes sense. I was testing this on a single GPU a local training configuration. If I'm only using the local case, should I manually add a second hook which is the _CheckForStoppingHook?

body: Ah yes, that makes sense. I was testing this on a single GPU a local training configuration. If I'm only using the local case, should I manually add a second hook which is the `_CheckForStoppingHook`?
